General.Name: Jiangsu Akcome Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Akcome New Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures photovoltaic solar accessories in the People's Republic of China. It also operates photovoltaic power stations. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Akcome Science and Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Akcome New Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. in August 2023. Zhejiang Akcome New Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Zhangjiagang, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 101, Jintang West Road, Zhangjiagang, China, 215600
